title: account bugged
body: my main is bugged it says its transfered to another region, I have never done that. I have tried to log in to eu west / eu east , east says transferred / west says unexpected error. I have contacted support for many many many times still nothing has been done. I can LOG in to client + website on different account so everything is working fine expect the ACCOUNT so can some1 help me with this issue? or is my main account just vanished?

replies.body:
What was the Summoner Name of the other account? I can't look it up without any information, but after I know the name I can take a look and see what's going wrong.

Alternately, you're more apt to get a timely response on Account matters by sending a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our account team.

You could've been hacked, and switched to another region. To recover your account click here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account

Check this link for more help and support:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/categories/115001242867-Login-Issues

Try to reinstall League of Legends or check for corrupted files. If nothing seems to work, submit a ticket here: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
